text: I really hate being cold it was - 23
centigrade in Moscow last night is of
course much warmer today only - 15 you
lair you put on an undershirt a shirt
over that right now I think I'm wearing
10 if not 12 layers good gloves big
thick winter socks and it's probably
still not enough may have to sacrifice a
bit of style but at least you'll be warm
don't ever feel selfish when it's -
outside your fingers are gonna get
frozen and your phone is probably going
to die grabbing a hot drink or two all
the way to or from work is of course
possible in the city like Moscow you
might consider getting yourself a skin
suit just watch me here like this one
it's a very good thing for commuting
keep moving step your feet take as many
hot baths as you can it's a good thing
to keep you warm
if everything else fails get yourself a
cup of steaming hot chocolate have a cup
of tea and add a bit of serbian brandy
to it
get yourself a warm pet not a bear a cat
would be enough help the authorities
clean the streets that's gonna warm you
up and it's gonna keep your pavement
clean can we just cook for a second yeah
good to go what's the problem
